Top-3 Similar Questions: so_12604366: How to delete every other file in a directory from a shell command?
Top-3 Scripts:
so_12604366: delete=yes
for file in *.png
do
    if [ $delete = yes ]
    then echo $file; delete=no
    else delete=yes
    fi
done |
xargs rm -f

ls *.png |
awk 'NR % 2 == 1 { print }' |
xargs rm -f
